name: typoheads/formhandler
description: The swiss army knife for all kinds of mailforms, completely new written using the MVC concept. Result: Flexibility, Flexibility, Flexibility  :-).

suggest.typo3/cms-form: TYPO3 Form - Please try to migrate existing formhandler forms to this core extension
suggest.webit-de/formhandler-clearlog-task: Adds the formhandler log table to the »Table garbage collection« scheduler task
